additional_details.building_style: Chettinad-style duplex townhouse with traditional ornamentation and modern functionality.
additional_details.vastu_considerations: The design prioritizes natural light, ventilation, and proper room orientation according to Vastu principles. The plot is West-facing, ensuring that the main entrance and primary living areas are oriented towards the east for maximum auspicious energy.
